ygData.subject: 3rd party libraries that have newer releases than the ones bundled with Heritrix

I have done some research into the libraries bundled with Heritrix, and in
=
some cases newer libraries exist:

POI: Version 2.0-RC1-20031102 is in the =
bundle,
but POI exists now in version 2.5.1-final
(http://tomcat.edu.brock.=
dk/apache/jakarta/poi/release/bin/)

jasper-compiler/jasper-runtime: Tomcat=
 4.1.31 is released (September 16,
2004).
The jasper-x jar-files should be =
taken from this distribution
http://apache-mirror.dkuug.dk/jakarta/tomcat-4=
/v4.1.31/

itext: itext is now in version 1.2.1
(http://sourceforge.net/pro=
ject/showfiles.php?group_id=3D15255&package_id=3D12596&release_id=3D296145)=


commons-net: commons-net is now in version 1.3.0
(http://apache-mirror.dk=
uug.dk/jakarta/commons/net/binaries/)

Finally. I've noticed that
commons-c=
ollections exists twice in the Heritrix-bundle: Both version 2.1
and 3.1 of=
 commons-collection.
Is that necessary?

regards
